definition: Karnataka, southwest Indian state, capital Bangalore 班加羅爾|班加罗尔[Ban1 jia1 luo2 er3]/formerly Mysore
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: However, Karnataka is the only state where the production of groundnut may rise.
sentences.chinese: 然而，卡納塔克邦是花生產量唯一可能增加的邦。

sentences.english: This year, too, Karnataka is likely to top anti-Christian attacks.
sentences.chinese: 今年，也可能是頂部卡納塔克邦反基督教的攻擊。

sentences.english: "There may be increase in production in Karnataka by about 50,000 MT", says the report.
sentences.chinese: 報告指出，“卡納塔克邦產量可能增加大約5萬噸”。

sentences.english: Mr. Naidu is no longer Karnataka's industries minister.
sentences.chinese: 納伊杜現在已經不再擔任卡納塔克邦的工業部長。
